articles.content: Official sources have indicated that if re-elected, the Narendra Modi government plans to prioritize the implementation of the long-pending Direct Taxes Code ( DTC ). Discussions are already underway… [+2816 chars]

articles.author: Nidhi Verma
articles.title: Russia squeezes Mideast, OPEC shares in India's oil market to historic lows - Reuters.com
articles.description: Russia became the top oil supplier to India during the fiscal year 2023/24 for a second year in a row, squeezing the market share of Middle Eastern and OPEC producers to historic lows, ship tracking data from industry sources showed.

- Likely to get different wheels and tyres
